local_intent: Close the gripper with low force on the bin lid edge after alignment and verify grasp stability.
assumptions: Lid edge is reachable once detected and aligned within 1 cm.
coherence_with_global: Realizes the grasp phase in GLOBAL_BT by executing CloseGripper(force=10, timeout=800) after perception and alignment, then verifying with IsGraspStable before proceeding to OpenContainer.
